pullrequest.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw:
We've discussed the issue during the Mentor2 meeting and it we think we can keep the polyline behavior intact, but modify how we parse the SVG (instead of creating a polyline per SVG path, we will create closed polylines contours from all the SVG paths). A little more work, but worth it.
Your sdf flag is my second favorite option.
content.html: We've discussed the issue during the Mentor2 meeting and it we think we can keep the polyline behavior intact, but modify how we parse the SVG (instead of creating a polyline per SVG path, we will create closed polylines contours from all the SVG paths). A little more work, but worth it. Your sdf flag is my second favorite option.
